name: Civolution - Planet Culture Simulator
description:
This game is currently in development, we will add more content and listen to your feedback!

Civolution is a real time strategy and simulation game, with free exploration through space flight. 

You will build your empire, explorate the vast universe and experience many stories. 

  • Unique story telling through events. 
  • A rich and growing lore, told by finding relics
  • Explore the universe with your own space ship

Languages: German and English

System Requirements:

CPU: AMD Phenom II B50/AMD FX-4200

Graphics: Geforce GTX 670 2GB

4 GB Ram

Windows 7

Disc space: 307 MB
